task.summary: Default task
Branch NWNX_Player's StopGuiTimingBar call based on the type of script passed in.
Increase the benefit of firearm accuracy and add a bonus/penalty based on DEX modifier when firing guns.
Update database backup.
Fix a server crash issue when player HP reaches -9, they log out, and log back in. Also fix a very glaring bug in the dying event where HP wasn't being healed properly.
Update the NWNX2 library. Increase the effectiveness of treatment kits. Slightly decrease the effectiveness of herbal remedies. Update the database backup.
Roll back the org.nwnx.nwnx2.jvm.jar library due to some crashing problems. Update module with lighting fixes.
Update NWNX
Update NWNX, update module to use new NWNX core script.
Rebuilt the JVM jar file. Removed the NWNX set event handlers and updated references to use the built-in one now. Updated the module.
Update database + module with Drakaden's changes.
Reduce Zahir DC from 18 to 12. Fixes #97
Update module to use the new NWNX core script. It got overwritten in one of the previous updates accidentally.
Add missing blueprint items to module.
Update readme
Add sample server start scripts and rename czs-server-files folder to server-files.
Fix issue with error on persistent outfit storage. Remove dead testing code.
Perform the PC check when a DM uses a research terminal instead of the Initialize method of the convo. Fixes #113
Remove broken options in the armor appearance crafting menu. Fixes #16
Add license.
Update database backup.
Update module + database.
Add Base Attack Bonus upgrade
Update database + module. Add event hooks for PCs. Currently only a handful of them work, but I added them in preparation for when the rest work in EE.
Recalc BAB on client login.
Remove debug line.
Backup database and update module.
Add missing script files to module.
Use environment variables for database connections. Remove ini4j library. Update jvm library. Remove dead area instancing code.
Remove database.ini example and update docker scripts to use new environment variables for SQL server.
Recalc AC on client login.
Create additional items if crafted or found items are not stackable.
Increase minimum roll on disease checks to 1 instead of 0.
Prevent cure and regenerate from being cast on undead targets.
Fix radio message delivery.
Update server script to use correct image.
Fix Poison and other damage over time spells to give XP to caster if target dies.
Add XP tome books. Update module to include the items. Update database backup.
Fix several issues with the repair kits.
Add a new player guide.
Add item to grant revival stone to players.
Ignore sanctuary effects if player enters OOC area. This should prevent it from being removed automatically after a server reset.
Persistent map pins.
Spawn additional items in the chest inventory when searching instead of the player.
Add label to starting door showing Normal/Hard difficulties for Ruby and Zodiac respectively.
Add a way for players to change their description from the character management menu.
Fix a typo.
Add a way to toggle helmets from the character management menu.
Add a way to change container names.
Reapply custom names on structures after reload.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Reapply custom names on structures after reload.
